Package br.com.concepting.framework.util

Class BarcodeGenerator

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.util.BarcodeGenerator
public class BarcodeGenerator extends Object
Class responsible to manipulate barcodes.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BarcodeGenerator getInstance()

    • generate

      public byte[] generate(BarcodeType barcodeType, ContentType imageType, String value) throws IOException
      Generates a barcode image.
      Parameters:
      barcodeType - Instance that contains the type of the barcode.
      imageType - Instance that contains the type of image that will be used.
      value - String that contains the value for the barcode.
      Returns:
      Byte array that contains the data of the generated image.
      Throws:
      IOException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
